title: Special Topics in Women's Studies; Gender & Body in Iran
description: Also offered as PERS252. Credit only granted for: PERS298A, PERS252, or WMST298J. Formerly: PERS298A. Multidisciplinary approach to key topics concerning gender and body in Iran, to include insights from religion, history, sociology, anthropology, disability studies, travel literature,arts, and fashion. Taught in English.
